hero.subText: Senior at the University of Minho, undertaking a computer science master.

description: I'm a senior at the University of Minho currently undertaking a computer science master. In the past year, I specialized in Distributed Systems and High-Performance Computing. One of my passion is studying new algorithms and making implementations that take the most of the available resources. While choosing my thesis subject, I considered this, and I am developing a consensus algorithm implementation using both Disk Paxos and SPDK (a high-performance toolkit for remote disk access).

Since I was a kid, my parents always encouraged me to have good grades. I have been at the top of my classes since I can remember, although when I was in my third year of college I figured out that grades are not everything and decided to developed other soft-skills. I joined an organization called UDREAM, which taught me how to be a better version of myself and to empower others around me. Since then, I have been focusing on improving leadership skills and actively participated in programs that forced me to be in distinct environments and to meet different persons.

TargetTimeline.subtitle: Working Process
TargetTimeline.title: Journey
TargetTimeline.description: Here are some of the projects I was part of over the years. The areas of these projects go from social iniciatives, management opportunities or working experience.

events.name: Project Manager at PEI Course
events.text: Project Manager of Nite, a digital drinking card for pubs and nightclubs. Nite provides a system that empowers the experience of a customer when at one of these establishments by allowing digital payments and remote control of each card. The team had nine people from different backgrounds and forced me to build team spirit, solve internal issues, and coordinate multiple tasks.

events.name: Camp In, Just a Change
events.text: Just a Change is a nonprofit organization that rehabilitates houses in rural and poor areas of Portugal. As part of their "Camp In" initiative, I spent 13 intensive days rehabilitating a house of an elderly man that lived in inhuman conditions.

events.name: Member of UDREAM
events.text: U.DREAM is an educational project which has the mission of educating students to be social leaders. This project focus on solving three main issues related to the difficulty of finding individual purpose, managing relations, and generate social impact in your community. The students work not only with self-development but are also involved in social experiences like accompaniments to families whose kids have serious health issues or nursing homes.

events.name: Summer Internship at AnyBrain
events.text: Any Brain develops machine learning software to detect video game fraud. Worked in 2 distinct tasks. The first one required an analysis of multiple machine learning algorithms implementation such as LighGBM, H2O, and Sci-Kit in a company dataset. The second was the development of a local cache using Redis to reduce the charge placed in both the system and the network.
